[[# Entry template. ****WARNING: THIS IS THE TESTDATA TEMPLATE, NOT THE PRODUCTION ONE !!**** The generated entry should be a piece of HTML, not a full document. Parameters: - base_url: The generated site's base URL. May be empty. - title: string, title of the entry - tags: dict{string tag: string value}, the parsed Izu tags. - sections: dict{string name: string content}, the HTML for the various sections. - Expected sections names: html (old html), en, fr and images. ]]

[[html title]]

[[for name in ["en", "html", "images"] ]] [[if name in sections]][[raw sections[name] ]]
[[end]] [[end]]
